tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE riders (
  rider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  city VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE rides (
    ride_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rider_id INT,
    ride_date DATE,
    ride_distance DECIMAL(5,2),
    ride_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE ride_history (
  ride_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rider_id INT,
  ride_date DATE,
  distance FLOAT,
  fare DECIMAL(8,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rider_id INT,
    trip_date DATE,
    trip_time TIME,
    trip_duration INT,
    fare DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE rides (
    ride_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rider_id INT,
    ride_date DATE,
    ride_type VARCHAR(20),
    cost DECIMAL
);
